game.title: The Frozen Kingdom
game.description: Travel to the frozen kingdom in the north, overcome its icy challenges and defeat the cruel Ice Queen to restore warmth to the land.

task.description: Survive the bitterly cold and dangerous Icy Wastes to reach the Ice Queen's Palace. Watch out for Abominable Snow Beasts!
Navigate the deadly traps and puzzles of the Ice Queen's Palace to find her throne room.
Challenge and defeat the Ice Queen in an epic battle. Beware, she uses powerful ice magic!
